HairDew //Strings for activity_login Go Back to Nature, Back to Natural When caring for your precious coils, you deserve the best. Create Explore FAQ //Strings for FAQ How Does It Work? Hair Dew is an application that allows you to create organic hair products with just the click of a few buttons. By clicking on the Create tab you are taken to a page that explores the different steps of making your own product. At the bottom of this page you click, once again, on the Create button and can begin the process of choosing what goes into your very own product. Ideally you would choose a base, an oil, and perhaps a scent. But feel free to mix and match as you please. You\'re the creator and this is your lab. Can I Purchase Products Individually Or Must I Follow All The Steps? We do sell products individually. Go to the Create page where you begin to build your own product and at the top there is the option of purchasing products individually. Are Refunds Available? We would hate to hear that you are not satisfied with your creation and we provide a place for feedback however, we do not accept returns nor do we make refunds. Who Owns Hair Dew? Hair Dew was founded by Jillian Johnson. You can read more about her here. I Don\'t See What I Want, Do You Take Personal Requests? We love feedback and encourage requests and critics of many kinds. If you would like to order something we don\t have listed we will source it out for you. //Strings for activity_create We\'re All Mad Here Choose Your Base Choose Your Oil Choose Your Scent "This is the nourishing foundation for your creation."
